titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress that a commemorative postage stamp should be issued honoring Barbara Charline Jordan.
Expressing the sense of Congress that a commemorative postage stamp should be issued honoring Barbara Charline Jordan.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: Declares the sense of Congress that the U.S. Postal Service should issue a commemorative postage stamp honoring Barbara Charline Jordan.
